title: PHPstr_shuffle()Function

metadata.description: Learn about PHPstr_shuffle()Function with clear explanations and practical examples.

content_sections.title: Details
content_sections.content:
Example
Randomly shuffle all characters of a string:
<?php
echo str_shuffle("Hello World");
?>

Definition and Usage
The str_shuffle() function randomly shuffles all the characters of a string.
Syntax
str_shuffle(
string
)
Parameter Values
Parameter
Description
string
Required. Specifies the string to shuffle
Technical Details
Return Value:
Returns the shuffled string
PHP Version:
4.3.0+

★
+1
